content:
Harlan takes a sip from his canteen. "Can you imagine what this place must have been like 1,500 years ago?" he asks, somewhat rhetorically. "Bustling with life, I'm sure! Shall we continue?"

A) Let's keep looking. Discard all   from Harlan Vos. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Help him track down his daughter, Quisi Vos.

B) I'm sure Quisi will turn up. Discard Harlan Vos. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
